natlang.rdg.documentplanner
Class InitialDocPlanBuilderTester

java.lang.Object
  natlang.rdg.documentplanner.InitialDocPlanBuilderTester
public class InitialDocPlanBuilderTester
extends java.lang.Object

InitialDocumentPlanBuilder is the first component of the DocumentPlanner and is responsible for the conversion of the fabula in OWL format into an initial document plan This class is created for testing purposes, in order to check if the algorithm correctly builds larger structures than the Plop example.

Constructor Summary
InitialDocPlanBuilderTester()
          Constructor - creates the OWL Reasoning context and reads the fabula
